name: Find The Afikoman
description:
Since most people are stuck in quarantine and are forced to have their seders over Zoom, I thought I'd design a game so everyone can go on a search for the Afikoman! 

In this game you have to run around your house to find where your family hid the Afikoman! With over 20 different hiding places,  the Afikoman will move all over the house.
